TopicTitle: Is there any way to change the font used in KSP2?

Articles.Content: Context: I use a 1366x768 monitor that's obviously not really supported by the game so most text hurts to look at.  Does anyone know if I can change it with mods or something? It's my main problem with the game right now since I get REALLY nervous after 30 minutes of gameplay
No. But reportedly they're reconsidering their design choices on that. Hit the UI feedback megathread if you like (better yet if you do so with appropriate screenshots)
